name: Top Down RTS
description:
This is a work in progress project.

I have been streaming the development of this game once in a while and have made the basics for the game. There is no goal yet but you can play around with the villagers and buildings.

Controlls:

left-click: select things
right-click: move villagers when selected
middle-mouse: place a villager on the spot
WASD: pan the camera around
